name: queue
description: Improved job scheduler for Apache Spark
author: Ivan Sadikov

scripts.compile: npm run compile_sass && npm run compile_coffee
scripts.lint: coffeelint -f coffeelint.json web/coffee && coffeelint -f coffeelint.json web/spec
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run compile
scripts.misc_copy_octicons: for f in $(find node_modules/octicons/octicons -type f \( -name '*.eot' -or -name '*.ttf' -or -name '*.svg' -or -name '*.woff' \)); do cp $f static/; done
scripts.publish: npm run setup && npm run build && npm run misc_copy_octicons && npm run misc_copy_favicon && npm run misc_copy_view
